summary:
Adding Stone, Iron, Wood, Diamond and Gold Sword to Skyrim.
Probably this mod conflicts with other mods that use their own crafting categories.
You do need Hearthfire to craft the Stone Sword.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds Minecraft - like swords to skyrim.

I\'m up to make the tools, the bow, and maybe some armor too.

All swords have crafting recipies and are improvable.
Swords are listed under the category \"Minerim\".
The diamond sword has 2 crafting recipies, because diamonds are too hard to find i guess.

No whining about how ugly minecraft texture is.

This is my first Nexus Mod, so pls don\'t flame me.

I also made:
[List]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/manage//?]Tensa Tsangetsu[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36121/?]Obsidian Sword[/url]
[/List]

You do need Hearthfire to craft the Stone Sword.

If you need info and your english is not very good, I\'m Austrian so you can as well ask me in german.

______________________________________________________
Version 1.0:
Added Wood Sword
Added Stone Sword
Added Iron Sword
Added Gold Sword
Added Diamond Sword
author: LordStuff
